!
! Extreme Networks VOSS Basic Configuration
! VSP 4450GTX-HT-PWR+
!
snmp-server name "vsp-switch-01"
!
! VLAN Configuration
vlan create 10 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 20 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 30 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 100 type port-mstprstp 0
!
! VLAN Members
vlan members 10 1/1-1/12 portmember
vlan members 20 1/13-1/24 portmember
vlan members 30 1/25-1/36 portmember
vlan members 100 1/37-1/48 portmember
!
! Interface Configuration
interface GigabitEthernet 1/1
   no shutdown
   default-vlan-id 10
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/13
   no shutdown
   default-vlan-id 20
exit
!
interface GigabitEthernet 1/25
   no shutdown
   default-vlan-id 30
exit
!
! Management Interface
interface mgmtEthernet mgmt
   ip address 10.0.10.1 255.255.255.0
exit
!
! NTP Configuration
ntp server 10.0.10.100
ntp server 10.0.10.101
!
! Logging Configuration
logging host 10.0.10.200
logging host 10.0.10.201
!
! SSH Configuration
ssh
   no shutdown
exit
!
! SNMP Configuration
snmp-server community "public" ro
snmp-server community "private" rw
!
